title: Source Export: LinkedIn + Website
summary:
LINKEDIN INFORMATION
About
Iâ€™m a Data and ML-focused Engineer with experience building real-time machine learning services, automated data pipelines and production-ready APIs. I enjoy taking complex technical problems and turning them into reliable, efficient systems that reduce manual work and deliver faster insights.

My recent work includes Python-based ETL pipelines processing more than 100,000 images a day, Apache Airflow DAGs with CI testing, and optimising YOLO and ResNet models for GPU deployment. Iâ€™ve also delivered Dockerised microservices, monitoring dashboards in Grafana and Prometheus, and workflow automation that improved operational efficiency for clients.

Iâ€™m comfortable working across the full engineering stack â€“ Python, SQL, Linux, Docker, GitLab CI/CD, REST APIs and AWS services â€“ and I bring a practical understanding of data science and feature engineering to support model development and automation.

Iâ€™m now looking for opportunities in Data Engineering, ML Engineering, Software Engineering or Process Automation where I can contribute to scalable systems, strengthen my engineering skills and continue building high-impact solutions.
All activity
âœ¨ Proud to share that I completed the Thames Moonlight 10 Mile Walk hosted by Ultra Challenge, raising funds for Parkinsonâ€™s UK!

This walk was especially meaningful, as it was in memory of my grandma Jyotshnabaa, who lived with Parkinsonâ€™s for over 4 years. 

ğŸŒ§ï¸ Despite the rain, every step was for a great cause close to my heart. As a team, we have raised over Â£3000 for Parkinson's UK.

ğŸ“Š Results Iâ€™m really proud of:
- Time: 2 hrs 46 min 42 sec
- Pace: 10.22 min/km
- Finished in the Top 17 males and Top 60 out of 506 participants

ğŸ… Crossing the finish line and receiving the medal was such a rewarding moment.

ğŸ‘‰ If youâ€™d like to support Parkinsonâ€™s UK and their vital work, donations can be made here: https://lnkd.in/gD_-kdup

A huge thank you to everyone who has supported me so far â€” it means the world! ğŸ’™
hashtag#ThamesMoonlightWalk hashtag#UltraChallenge hashtag#ParkinsonsUK hashtag#CharityChallenge
âœ¨ Last night I had the opportunity to attend Product Evenings LDN: Agentic AI and Rewriting the Product Playbook, hosted by BrainStation.

A big thank you to Anna Hyclak, Senior Product Manager, for an insightful talk on how Agentic AI is reshaping product strategy.

ğŸ”‘ Key takeaways:

- Agents follow a perception â†’ cognition â†’ action cycle

- Unlike traditional systems, agents are goal-oriented rather than just task-oriented

- The importance of data quality: AI is only as good as the data you feed it â†’ garbage in, garbage out

- RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) is becoming essential for grounding AI systems with context and accuracy

It was inspiring to connect with so many product and AI enthusiasts, share ideas, and explore how this paradigm shift will impact the future of product development.

ğŸ’¡ Excited to keep learning and experimenting with these concepts!

hashtag#BrainStation hashtag#ProductManagement hashtag#AgenticAI hashtag#AI hashtag#Innovation
ğŸš€Â Undergraduate dissertation milestone!
Iâ€™ve just wrapped up my BEng (EEE) at the University of Surrey with a final-year project that pushes printed photovoltaics a step closer to real-world adoption:

Bar-coated, semitransparent perovskite solar cellsÂ âœ¨ğŸ”‹

ğŸ”Â Key results from the work
Metric | Champion device | Average of 6 devices
Power conversion efficiency (AM1.5 G, stabilised) | 5.4 % | 4.8 %
Visible transmittance (380â€“780 nm, AVT) | 28 % | 27 %
Active area | 1 cmÂ² | â€”
Processing speed (single pass) | 120 mm sâ»Â¹ | â€”

Bar-coating delivered highly uniform films acrossÂ 25 cmÂ²Â substrates, demonstrating the scalability of the process for roll-to-roll lines. The semitransparency means the devices can double as power-generating window panesâ€”ideal for building-integrated PV and smart faÃ§ades.
This journey wouldnâ€™t have been possible without the guidance of Ehsan Rezaee, PhD, Professor Ravi Silva FREng CBE and the inspiring team at Surreyâ€™sÂ Scaled Printing Laboratory (SPL). Check out the labâ€™s broader work here:

ğŸ”— https://lnkd.in/egrMAfVZ

A big thank-you to everyone in the Advanced Technology Institute, and to friends & family for their unwavering support.
Iâ€™m excited to keep exploring printed electronics, perovskites, and sustainable-energy solutionsâ€”if youâ€™re working in these areas, letâ€™s connect!
hashtag#Perovskite hashtag#SolarEnergy hashtag#PrintedElectronics hashtag#Research hashtag#UniversityOfSurrey
On 25 June 2025 I was formally awarded a BEng (Hons) in Electronic Engineering with Upper Second-Class Honours by the University of Surrey.
 
During the degree I dove deep into some truly inspiring modules, including: 
- Nanoscience & Nanoparticles â€“ exploring materials at the atomic scale
- Semiconductors & Optoelectronics â€“ from device physics to LED/laser design
- Robotics â€“ building and programming autonomous systems
- Computer Vision & Pattern Recognition â€“ teaching machines to interpret the world

For my final-year dissertation, I developed transparent perovskite solar cells, investigating how high-efficiency, barely visible photovoltaics could be integrated into windows and display glassâ€”work that reinforced my passion for sustainable, human-centred technology.

Whatâ€™s next? Iâ€™m eager to bring my skills in nano-fabrication, optoelectronic device engineering and machine-vision-driven robotics to an innovative engineering team. If your organisation is tackling exciting challenges in advanced materials, renewable energy or intelligent hardware, letâ€™s connect!

A heartfelt thank-you to my professors, mentors, family and friends for their unwavering supportâ€”this milestone is ours to share.

hashtag#ElectronicEngineering hashtag#Nanotechnology hashtag#Optoelectronics hashtag#Robotics hashtag#ComputerVision hashtag#SolarEnergy hashtag#ClassOf2025 hashtag#UniversityOfSurrey
ğŸŒŸ Reflecting on a Year of Growth and Impact at Vision4ce ğŸŒŸ

As I look back on the past year at Vision4ce, Iâ€™m proud of the many opportunities Iâ€™ve had to contribute to meaningful projects, develop new skills, and make a tangible impact on our workflows and systems. Itâ€™s been a year of tackling complex challenges, optimizing processes, and working with a talented team to drive innovation and efficiency.

Key Highlights
ğŸš€ Optimization & Model Efficiency
Worked on optimizing machine learning models, reducing inference times, and improving overall performance. These optimizations contributed to more efficient workflows and faster results for key processes.

ğŸ”„ Automation & Pipeline Development
Developed and optimized multiple automation pipelines, enabling smoother, faster data processing, and reducing manual intervention across workflows. This significantly improved operational efficiency.

ğŸ”§ Error Handling & System Reliability
Enhanced system stability by implementing robust error handling and creating automated testing frameworks, minimizing downtime and improving the reliability of complex processes.

ğŸ“Š Algorithm Implementation
Contributed to the implementation and fine-tuning of algorithms, leading to more efficient task execution and optimization of resources across systems.

ğŸ’¡ MLOps & Workflow Tools
This year, I had the chance to work with advanced tools focused on machine learning operations, workflow orchestration, and system monitoring. These tools helped streamline complex processes, manage large-scale data tasks, and ensure system performance and reliability.

ğŸ§  Learning & Collaboration
A special shout-out to Jonathan Mirza and the entire Vision4ce team for their incredible collaboration and support throughout the year. Their insights and mentorship have been key to my growth and success.

Looking ahead, Iâ€™m excited to apply these lessons to future challenges and continue contributing to our shared success. Hereâ€™s to another year of growth, innovation, and making an impact! ğŸš€

Welcome to my portfolio website showcasing my skills and projects! This website serves as a testament to my proficiency in web development and design. Utilizing cutting-edge technologies such as React.js and Three.js, I've crafted an immersive experience where visitors can explore various facets of my expertise.
